title: The Chronicles of the Secret Society: The End of the Standoff
description: Peace doesnâ€™t mean war...or does it? In a futuristic, fear ridden America due to a growing society of genetically engineered humans; Zaylee Cross finds herself born into this life of hiding with a protective organization created to help those who were created by at least one of these "Specials". The Simples, or ordinary humans, and the Specials have had a mutual Standoff since the creation of the Society. Deep in her teenage years, however, the Simples begin attacking neutral compounds containing Specials. This throws even the youngest generations into a war they've been trying to avoid. Zaylee is drawn farther into the chaos and left with two options. Continue to hide, or finally take a stand for the freedom they've never had before.
author: Melia Burrell
